domain.comment: Always use the same domain to register with. Leave this empty to allow the user to choose his server.

check-on-startup.comment: Check for available updates on startup

enable-multicast.comment: Enable multicasting messages to multiple recipients

notify.comment: Get notified of extended presence changes

url-filter.comment: Ingore tune by media file extension

tune.url-filter: avi asf asx mpg mpg2 mpeg mpe mst mp4 flv 3gp mkv wmv swf rv rm rst dat vob ifo ogv

title-filter.comment: Ignore tune by name via RegExp

auto-join.comment: Automatically join bookmarked conference rooms that are configured for auto-joining.

show-joins.comment: Display notices of users joining and leaving conferences

show-role-affiliation.comment: Include role and affiliation changes in join messages, and display notices of changes

show-status-changes.comment: Show status changes in groupchat window

accept-defaults.comment: Automatically accept the default room configuration when a new room is created.

auto-configure.comment: Automatically open the configuration dialog when a new room is created. This option only has effect if accept-defaults is false.

context.comment: Options regarding the context being sent when joining a room

maxchars.comment: The maximum number of characters of context that should be sent when entering a room. Use a negative number for an unlimited amount.

maxstanzas.comment: The maximum number of context items that should be sent when entering a room. Use a negative number for an unlimited amount.

seconds.comment: The maximum number of context seconds that should be sent when entering a room. Use a negative number for an unlimited amount.

maximum.comment: The maximum number of recently joined rooms that should be remembered

auto-assign.comment: Automatically assign known keys to contacts with signed presences and no assigned keys

data-proxy.comment: Allow changing the data transfer proxy

sm.comment: Option related to the Stream Management UI

privacy.comment: Options related to the privacy UI

proxy.comment: Options related to the proxy UI

security.comment: Options related to the seciruty UI

single.comment: Limit the client to a single account

theme.comment: The theme used for chat messages rendering

show.comment: Show avatars in the chat dialog

default-jid-mode-ignorelist.comment: Default autojid mode ignore list: jid1,jid2,...

auto-delete-unlisted.comment: Automatically remove an unlisted contact from the contact list if it does not have any pending messages anymore

opacity.comment: Opacity percentage of the contact list

single-line.comment: Show status messages on the same line as the nickname

tooltip.comment: Display options for the contact list tooltips

temp-no-roster-animation.comment: Disable animated icons. This option will be removed as soon as the contactlist code is optimized enough

autohide-contact-filter.comment: Hide contacts filter on contact ativate

menu-titles.comment: Show menu title as a first line

show-initial-joins.comment: Show joins on your MUC join (with status and priority, depends on options)

theme.comment: The theme used for groupchat messages rendering

spell-check.comment: Options related to the spell checker

enabled.comment: Whether the spell checker is enabled

systemtray.comment: Options related to the system tray

use-old.comment: Use the old system tray code (deprecated)

flash-windows.comment: Allow windows to flash upon activity

received.comment: Color used to indicate received messages.

sent.comment: Color used to indicate sent messages.

informational.comment: Color used to indicate informational (status change, spooled) messages.

usertext.comment: Color used to indicate additional text for informational messages.

items-per-page.comment: Number of items per page for page-by-page feature (XEP-0059). 0 turns this feature off.

grouping.comment: A ':' seperated list of groups of kinds of tabs to keep in the same tabset. 'C' for chat and 'M' for mucs. 'A' means using all in one window patch.

group-state.comment: Saved state data of the tabsets defined by options.ui.tabs.grouping

tab-singles.comment: Tab types that would have been untabbed are given their own tabset. 'C' for chat and 'M' for mucs

multi-rows.comment: Use multi rows mode for chat tab bar

current-index-at-bottom.comment: Move current row to bottom in multi-row mode

change-case.comment: Change case of letters in the chat edit

assign-custom-avatar.comment: Assign a custom avatar to the selected contact

clear-custom-avatar.comment: Remove custom avatar from the selected contact

chat.comment: Open a chat to the selected contact

message.comment: Send a message to the selected contact

login-transport.comment: Log on to the selected transport

user-info.comment: Show the user info of the contact

global.comment: Shortcuts available from outside of the application

service-discovery.comment: Shortcuts in the service discovery dialog

store-muc-private.comment: Keep a history of correspondence for MUC private

enabled.comment: Store passwords in keyring manager only
